rate.rateComments: Check-in hour 15:00-.Car park YES (without additional debit notes) 10.00 USD Per unit/night.Early departure.Identification card at arrival.Deposit on arrival.Minimum check-in age 21.Our rates are for individual leisure travelers and do not apply to any convention for which the hotel is an official supplier. The hotel reserves the right to reject such bookings which should be made via the convention housing program.
